    • Constructor Detail

      • GearOrganizer

        public GearOrganizer()
        Instantiates the GearOrganizer object. Intializes collection maximum size and value maximum size. The value size is comparable to Power, Defense, and Accuracy.

    • Method Detail

      • action

        public void action()
        Main loop of the program. Calls the other methods that interface with the GearCollection.

      • openChest

        public void openChest()
        Opens the chest and creates the gear. Each piece of gear will have random statistics generated for it.

      • equipGear

        public void equipGear()
        Equips the piece of gear that the user chooses.
        Parameters:
        index - the number associated with the piece of gear chosen

      • showGear

        public void showGear()
        Prints the list of gear for the player to choose from.

      • totalGearStats

        public java.lang.String totalGearStats()
        Returns:
        A string of the total stats for all equipped gear

      • filterGear

        public java.lang.String filterGear(java.lang.String choice)
        Filters the list of gear by gear type. It is chosen by the user.
        Parameters:
        choice - The choice of the user
        Returns:
        the new choice of the user

      • returnChoice

        public java.lang.String returnChoice()
        Returns the choice of the player. This includes choices like which gear to equip and the index of the chosen gear.
        Returns:
        the choice of the user

      • sort

        public void sort(java.lang.String choice)
        Calls the mergesort in gear collection
        Parameters:
        choice - The choice of the user which is what statistic to sort by
